Author: Moderator

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Brÿzz
Message: Yes, I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Brÿzz

Author: Brÿzz

Author: Andrew

Message: My studies will conclude with a paid job. No more classes nor homeworks ! It will help having more free time. And money, of course.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that's fantastic! I can't wait to reach that point too. What will you be doing?

Author: Brÿzz
Message: I'll be hired as a developer, mostly working with Java and a bit with React Native. I do not know if you know what those are, may you want me to describe those a bit ?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah I don't know much about coding. I study Biology.

Author: Brÿzz
Message: Then I may ask what you're specificaly studying in Biology once I am done, I'm curious. React Native is a JavaScript, using, such as Java both are languages about using objects and their  properties.

Author: Brÿzz
Message: I forgot some words, my bad. React Native allows to create cross-platform mobile apps using javascript. It's pretty neat. How long will your studies last  ?

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh so you're making apps for phones and tablets? That's cool. My studies will probably last for at least 6 more years, with the master and phd. Good thing that I like studying.

Author: Brÿzz
Message: Indeed, that is a long time. Then I do suppose you found your way! This is good. What do you hope to work as when you are done with it ?

Author: Andrew
Message: I hope to do research on the brain. I'm mostly aiming for neurobiology, to try to understand how we learn things, in its biological aspect.

Author: Brÿzz
Message: This sounds very interresting. I hope you will discover how this does work, it might help with robotics and, what a coincidence, AI , I think. Am I right ?
